general_advisory: For upland use 110-115 days duration varieties e.g Mandakini, Stybhama, Sahabhagi dhan. For medium land use variety having duration less than 140 days i.e Naveen, govind, Sampad, Manaswini. For Lowland use varieties Hasanta, CR1014, CR1009, Sumit, Pratikhya, Swarna sub-1.

advisory: Frequent and light irrigation in the vegetable crops, attending reproductive stage i.e flowering and fruiting should be done in the rainless days to minimize flower and fruit drop in view of persisting hot days. Also use mulch to minimize evaporation of water from soil.

The district is likely to experience heat wave in coming three days. Cover the windows of cow shelters with gunny bags and spray water to keep them moisten. Make adequate arrangement for drinking water.

To protect Poultry birds from ongoing hot weather and minimize heat stress, make provision for adequate availability of drinking water, put wet gunny bags in the places left for ventilation in the noon hour.
